item001.title: Masala Oats Upma
item001.description: Savory oats cooked with vegetables, spices, and curry leaves. A fiber-rich breakfast that keeps you full longer. Significance: High in soluble fiber which helps control blood sugar levels, supports digestive health, and aids in weight management. Perfect for diabetes management and heart health.
item001.healthBenefit: Rich in beta-glucan fiber that lowers cholesterol and stabilizes blood sugar. Contains antioxidants and essential minerals.

item002.title: Moong Dal Cheela (Protein Pancake)
item002.description: Protein-packed savory pancakes made from ground moong dal with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Significance: Excellent plant-based protein source with all essential amino acids. Supports muscle building, weight loss, and provides sustained energy throughout the morning.
item002.healthBenefit: High in protein (24g per 100g), low glycemic index, rich in folate and iron. Supports muscle recovery and blood sugar control.

item003.title: Vegetable Poha with Peanuts
item003.description: Flattened rice cooked with mixed vegetables, peanuts, curry leaves, and turmeric. Light yet filling breakfast. Significance: Easy to digest, provides quick energy, rich in iron and carbohydrates. The peanuts add protein and healthy fats for sustained energy.
item003.healthBenefit: Rich in iron, B-vitamins, and antioxidants from turmeric. Probiotic-friendly and easy on the stomach.

item004.title: Egg White Omelette with Vegetables
item004.description: Fluffy egg white omelette loaded with bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and spinach. Significance: Pure protein with minimal fat and calories. Ideal for muscle building and weight loss. Provides essential amino acids without the cholesterol of egg yolks.
item004.healthBenefit: Contains 11g protein per 100g with zero fat. Rich in selenium, vitamin D, and B-vitamins for energy metabolism.

item005.title: Quinoa Vegetable Upma
item005.description: Protein-rich quinoa cooked with mixed vegetables, mustard seeds, and curry leaves. Significance: Complete protein with all 9 essential amino acids. Gluten-free superfood that supports muscle building, weight management, and provides sustained energy.
item005.healthBenefit: Contains 14g protein per 100g, rich in magnesium, iron, and fiber. Low glycemic index helps control blood sugar.

item006.title: Ragi (Finger Millet) Dosa
item006.description: Nutritious dosa made from ragi flour, rich in calcium and iron. Crispy and healthy alternative to regular dosa. Significance: Excellent for bone health, diabetes management, and weight control. High in amino acids and natural calcium.
item006.healthBenefit: Contains 344mg calcium per 100g, high in iron and amino acids. Helps regulate blood sugar and supports bone density.

item007.title: Paneer Bhurji (Scrambled Cottage Cheese)
item007.description: Scrambled paneer with onions, tomatoes, and spices. High-protein vegetarian breakfast. Significance: Excellent source of complete protein and calcium. Supports muscle building, bone health, and provides sustained energy without meat.
item007.healthBenefit: Provides 18g protein per 100g, rich in calcium, phosphorus, and conjugated linoleic acid (CLA) for fat loss.

item008.title: Sprouted Moong Salad
item008.description: Fresh sprouted moong beans with cucumber, tomatoes, lemon, and chaat masala. Significance: Living food packed with enzymes, vitamins, and easily digestible protein. Boosts immunity and aids digestion.
item008.healthBenefit: Sprouting increases vitamin C by 600%, protein digestibility by 30%. Rich in enzymes and antioxidants.

item009.title: Besan (Chickpea Flour) Chilla
item009.description: Savory pancakes made from chickpea flour with vegetables and spices. Significance: High in protein and fiber, gluten-free, and helps manage blood sugar. Perfect for diabetes and weight management.
item009.healthBenefit: Contains 22g protein per 100g, rich in folate, iron, and resistant starch that feeds gut bacteria.

item010.title: Idli with Sambar
item010.description: Steamed rice cakes served with lentil-vegetable stew. Traditional South Indian breakfast. Significance: Fermented food rich in probiotics, easy to digest, low in calories. The combination provides complete protein.
item010.healthBenefit: Fermentation increases B-vitamins and bioavailability of minerals. Probiotic-rich for gut health.

item011.title: Chia Seed Pudding with Fruits
item011.description: Chia seeds soaked in almond milk with fresh fruits and nuts. Significance: Omega-3 rich superfood that provides sustained energy, supports heart health, and aids weight loss. High in fiber and protein.
item011.healthBenefit: Contains 17g fiber and 4g protein per ounce. Rich in omega-3 ALA, calcium, and antioxidants.

item012.title: Methi (Fenugreek) Paratha
item012.description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with fenugreek leaves and spices. Significance: Fenugreek is excellent for diabetes management, increases milk production in nursing mothers, and supports digestive health.
item012.healthBenefit: Fenugreek contains soluble fiber that slows sugar absorption. Rich in iron, magnesium, and vitamins.

item013.title: Boiled Egg with Avocado Toast
item013.description: Whole grain toast topped with mashed avocado and boiled eggs. Significance: Perfect combination of healthy fats, protein, and complex carbs. Supports heart health, brain function, and muscle building.
item013.healthBenefit: Avocado provides monounsaturated fats, eggs provide complete protein. Rich in choline for brain health.

item014.title: Vegetable Daliya (Broken Wheat Porridge)
item014.description: Savory broken wheat cooked with vegetables and spices. Significance: High in fiber and complex carbohydrates, provides sustained energy, aids digestion, and helps in weight management.
item014.healthBenefit: Rich in fiber, iron, and magnesium. Low glycemic index helps control blood sugar and cholesterol.

item015.title: Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts
item015.description: Thick Greek yogurt topped with mixed berries, nuts, and honey. Significance: High in protein and probiotics, supports gut health, muscle building, and provides antioxidants from berries.
item015.healthBenefit: Contains 10g protein per 100g, rich in probiotics, calcium, and vitamin B12. Berries provide antioxidants.

item016.title: Vegetable Uttapam
item016.description: Thick fermented rice pancake topped with vegetables. Significance: Probiotic-rich fermented food that's easy to digest, provides energy, and supports gut health.
item016.healthBenefit: Fermentation increases nutrient bioavailability and creates beneficial bacteria for gut health.

item017.title: Almond Butter Smoothie Bowl
item017.description: Thick smoothie made with banana, almond butter, and plant milk, topped with fruits and seeds. Significance: Nutrient-dense breakfast packed with healthy fats, protein, and antioxidants. Supports brain health and sustained energy.
item017.healthBenefit: Rich in vitamin E, magnesium, and healthy fats. Supports cognitive function and heart health.

item018.title: Chicken Sausage with Whole Wheat Toast
item018.description: Grilled chicken sausage with whole grain toast and vegetables. Significance: High-protein, low-fat breakfast that supports muscle building and provides sustained energy.
item018.healthBenefit: Lean protein source with essential amino acids. Supports muscle recovery and growth.

item019.title: Vegetable Semolina Upma
item019.description: Roasted semolina cooked with vegetables, curry leaves, and spices. Significance: Quick energy source, easy to digest, and provides essential nutrients. Good for active mornings.
item019.healthBenefit: Rich in iron, selenium, and B-vitamins. Provides quick energy for active days.

item020.title: Tofu Scramble with Vegetables
item020.description: Scrambled tofu with turmeric, vegetables, and spices. Vegan protein powerhouse. Significance: Complete plant-based protein, rich in iron and calcium. Perfect for vegans and those avoiding eggs.
item020.healthBenefit: Contains 8g protein per 100g, rich in iron, calcium, and isoflavones. Cholesterol-free protein source.

item001.title: Brown Rice with Dal Tadka
item001.description: Nutritious brown rice served with protein-rich yellow lentils tempered with spices. Significance: Complete protein when combined, high in fiber, supports heart health and diabetes management. The combination provides all essential amino acids.
item001.healthBenefit: Brown rice provides manganese and selenium, dal provides protein and folate. Together they form complete protein.

item002.title: Grilled Chicken Breast with Quinoa Salad
item002.description: Lean grilled chicken breast served with quinoa, mixed vegetables, and lemon dressing. Significance: High-protein, low-fat meal perfect for muscle building and weight loss. Provides complete nutrition with all essential amino acids.
item002.healthBenefit: Chicken provides 31g protein per 100g, quinoa adds fiber and minerals. Low in saturated fat.

item003.title: Palak Paneer with Roti
item003.description: Cottage cheese cubes in creamy spinach gravy served with whole wheat flatbread. Significance: Rich in protein, calcium, iron, and vitamins. Supports bone health, muscle building, and provides energy.
item003.healthBenefit: Spinach provides iron and folate, paneer provides protein and calcium. Rich in vitamin K for bone health.

item004.title: Rajma (Kidney Beans) Curry with Rice
item004.description: Protein-rich kidney beans in tomato-based gravy served with rice. Significance: Excellent plant-based protein source, high in fiber, supports heart health and diabetes management.
item004.healthBenefit: Kidney beans provide 24g protein per 100g, rich in folate, iron, and resistant starch for gut health.

item005.title: Fish Curry with Steamed Rice
item005.description: Fresh fish cooked in coconut-based curry with spices, served with steamed rice. Significance: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, high-quality protein, supports brain and heart health.
item005.healthBenefit: Omega-3 fatty acids reduce inflammation, support brain function. High-quality protein with all essential amino acids.

item006.title: Chole (Chickpea Curry) with Brown Rice
item006.description: Spicy chickpea curry served with fiber-rich brown rice. Significance: High in plant-based protein and fiber, supports digestive health, weight management, and provides sustained energy.
item006.healthBenefit: Chickpeas provide 19g protein per 100g, rich in folate, iron, and resistant starch. Low glycemic index.

item007.title: Grilled Paneer Tikka with Salad
item007.description: Marinated cottage cheese cubes grilled to perfection, served with fresh salad. Significance: High-protein, low-carb meal perfect for weight loss and muscle building. Rich in calcium and protein.
item007.healthBenefit: Paneer provides 18g protein per 100g, rich in calcium and conjugated linoleic acid (CLA) for fat loss.

item008.title: Mixed Vegetable Curry with Millet Roti
item008.description: Assorted vegetables in mild curry served with nutritious millet flatbread. Significance: Nutrient-dense, gluten-free meal rich in vitamins, minerals, and fiber. Supports overall health and diabetes management.
item008.healthBenefit: Millets are rich in magnesium, phosphorus, and antioxidants. Low glycemic index helps control blood sugar.

item009.title: Egg Curry with Whole Wheat Roti
item009.description: Boiled eggs in spicy tomato-onion gravy served with whole wheat flatbread. Significance: High-protein meal with complete amino acids, supports muscle building and provides sustained energy.
item009.healthBenefit: Eggs provide all essential amino acids, rich in choline, vitamin D, and B-vitamins.

item010.title: Tofu Tikka Masala with Cauliflower Rice
item010.description: Grilled tofu in creamy tomato gravy served with low-carb cauliflower rice. Significance: Vegan high-protein meal, low in carbs, perfect for weight loss and muscle building.
item010.healthBenefit: Tofu provides plant-based protein, cauliflower rice is low in calories and high in vitamins C and K.

item011.title: Chicken Biryani (Healthy Version)
item011.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with lean chicken, vegetables, and spices. Significance: Balanced meal with protein, carbs, and spices that boost metabolism. Made healthier with less oil and more vegetables.
item011.healthBenefit: Chicken provides lean protein, basmati rice has lower glycemic index, spices aid digestion and metabolism.

item012.title: Lentil Soup with Whole Grain Bread
item012.description: Hearty mixed lentil soup with vegetables, served with whole grain bread. Significance: High in protein and fiber, supports digestive health, heart health, and provides sustained energy.
item012.healthBenefit: Lentils provide 25g protein per 100g, rich in folate, iron, and resistant starch for gut health.

item013.title: Grilled Fish with Roasted Vegetables
item013.description: Grilled fish fillet with colorful roasted vegetables and herbs. Significance: Low-calorie, high-protein meal rich in omega-3s. Perfect for heart health, brain function, and weight management.
item013.healthBenefit: Rich in omega-3 EPA and DHA, supports cardiovascular health and cognitive function. Low in saturated fat.

item014.title: Vegetable Khichdi with Yogurt
item014.description: Comfort food made with rice, lentils, and vegetables, served with yogurt. Significance: Easy to digest, complete protein, probiotic-rich. Perfect for gut health and recovery.
item014.healthBenefit: Complete protein from rice-lentil combination, probiotics from yogurt support gut health.

item015.title: Mushroom and Spinach Curry with Quinoa
item015.description: Protein-rich mushrooms and iron-rich spinach in curry, served with quinoa. Significance: Vegan protein powerhouse, rich in iron, B-vitamins, and complete amino acids.
item015.healthBenefit: Mushrooms provide vitamin D and selenium, spinach provides iron, quinoa provides complete protein.

item016.title: Chicken Salad Bowl with Avocado
item016.description: Grilled chicken with mixed greens, avocado, nuts, and olive oil dressing. Significance: Nutrient-dense, high-protein meal with healthy fats. Perfect for weight loss and muscle building.
item016.healthBenefit: Lean protein from chicken, healthy fats from avocado, antioxidants from vegetables.

item017.title: Baingan Bharta with Bajra Roti
item017.description: Smoky roasted eggplant mash with pearl millet flatbread. Significance: Low-calorie, high-fiber meal rich in antioxidants. Supports heart health and diabetes management.
item017.healthBenefit: Eggplant is rich in nasunin (antioxidant), bajra provides iron and magnesium. Low glycemic index.

item018.title: Soya Chunk Curry with Brown Rice
item018.description: Textured soy protein in spicy curry served with brown rice. Significance: Vegan protein powerhouse, cholesterol-free, supports muscle building and heart health.
item018.healthBenefit: Soya chunks provide 52g protein per 100g, rich in isoflavones that support heart health.

item019.title: Prawn Curry with Coconut Rice
item019.description: Fresh prawns in coconut-based curry with aromatic rice. Significance: High-protein, low-fat seafood rich in selenium and omega-3s. Supports thyroid and heart health.
item019.healthBenefit: Prawns provide 24g protein per 100g, rich in selenium, vitamin B12, and omega-3 fatty acids.

item020.title: Mixed Bean Salad with Olive Oil Dressing
item020.description: Colorful salad with kidney beans, chickpeas, black beans, and vegetables. Significance: Plant-based protein powerhouse, high in fiber, supports gut health and weight management.
item020.healthBenefit: Beans provide complete protein when mixed, rich in resistant starch that feeds gut bacteria.

item001.title: Grilled Chicken with Steamed Broccoli
item001.description: Lean grilled chicken breast with steamed broccoli and herbs. Significance: Light, high-protein dinner that's easy to digest. Perfect for muscle recovery and weight management.
item001.healthBenefit: Chicken provides 31g protein per 100g, broccoli is rich in vitamin C, K, and sulforaphane (anti-cancer).

item002.title: Vegetable Soup with Whole Grain Crackers
item002.description: Hearty mixed vegetable soup with herbs, served with whole grain crackers. Significance: Low-calorie, nutrient-dense dinner that's easy on digestion. Perfect for weight loss and gut health.
item002.healthBenefit: Rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. Low in calories, high in fiber for satiety.

item003.description: Grilled cottage cheese cubes with fresh mint chutney and salad. Significance: High-protein, low-carb dinner perfect for muscle building and weight management.
item003.healthBenefit: Paneer provides complete protein and calcium, mint aids digestion and freshens breath.

item004.title: Baked Fish with Lemon and Herbs
item004.description: Oven-baked fish fillet with lemon, herbs, and roasted vegetables. Significance: Light, omega-3 rich dinner that supports heart and brain health. Easy to digest.
item004.healthBenefit: Rich in omega-3 EPA and DHA, supports cardiovascular health. Low in calories and saturated fat.

item005.title: Moong Dal Khichdi
item005.description: Light and easy-to-digest rice and lentil porridge with minimal spices. Significance: Comfort food that's gentle on the stomach, provides complete protein, perfect for dinner.
item005.healthBenefit: Complete protein from rice-lentil combination, easy to digest, supports gut healing.

item006.title: Tofu Stir-Fry with Vegetables
item006.description: Crispy tofu stir-fried with colorful vegetables in light sauce. Significance: Vegan high-protein dinner, low in calories, rich in nutrients. Perfect for weight management.

item007.description: Fluffy egg white omelette with mixed vegetables and fresh salad. Significance: Pure protein dinner with minimal calories, perfect for muscle building and fat loss.
item007.healthBenefit: Egg whites provide pure protein with zero fat, rich in selenium and B-vitamins.

item008.title: Palak (Spinach) Soup
item008.description: Creamy spinach soup with garlic and herbs. Significance: Iron-rich, low-calorie dinner that supports blood health and provides antioxidants.
item008.healthBenefit: Spinach is rich in iron, folate, vitamin K, and antioxidants. Supports blood health and immunity.

item009.description: Grilled paneer cubes with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and balsamic dressing. Significance: High-protein, low-carb dinner rich in calcium and nutrients.
item009.healthBenefit: Paneer provides protein and calcium, vegetables provide fiber and antioxidants.

item010.description: Light chicken broth with vegetables and herbs. Significance: Low-calorie, high-protein soup that's easy to digest and comforting.

item011.description: Saut√©ed mushrooms with quinoa, vegetables, and herbs. Significance: Vegan complete protein dinner, rich in B-vitamins and minerals.
item011.healthBenefit: Mushrooms provide vitamin D and selenium, quinoa provides complete protein and minerals.

item012.description: Delicate steamed fish with ginger, garlic, and soy sauce. Significance: Light, omega-3 rich dinner that's easy to digest and supports heart health.
item012.healthBenefit: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, low in calories, ginger aids digestion and reduces inflammation.

item013.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
item013.description: Colorful vegetables stir-fried with tofu in light sauce. Significance: Nutrient-dense vegan dinner, low in calories, high in protein and fiber.
item013.healthBenefit: Tofu provides plant protein, vegetables provide vitamins and antioxidants. Low glycemic index.

item014.description: Classic tomato soup with fresh basil and herbs. Significance: Low-calorie, antioxidant-rich dinner that supports heart health and immunity.

item016.description: Low-carb cauliflower rice served with protein-rich lentils. Significance: Low-calorie, high-protein dinner perfect for weight loss and diabetes management.
item016.healthBenefit: Cauliflower is low in calories and high in vitamins, dal provides protein and fiber.

item017.description: Marinated baked tofu with colorful roasted vegetables. Significance: Vegan protein dinner, rich in nutrients, supports muscle building and weight management.
item017.healthBenefit: Tofu provides complete plant protein, vegetables provide fiber and antioxidants.

item018.description: Light Chinese-style soup with egg ribbons and vegetables. Significance: Low-calorie, high-protein soup that's comforting and easy to digest.
item018.healthBenefit: Eggs provide complete protein, soup is hydrating and easy on digestion.

item019.description: Fresh vegetable salad with chickpeas, olive oil, and lemon dressing. Significance: Plant-based protein dinner, high in fiber, supports gut health and weight loss.

item020.description: Grilled fish fillet with refreshing cucumber and tomato salad. Significance: Light, omega-3 rich dinner that's low in calories and supports heart health.
